properties.label: Overview
properties.description: General overview of transport implementation

properties.label: Use Atmospheric Transport
properties.description: Is transport handled by the atmosphere, rather than within atmospheric cehmistry?

properties.label: Transport Details
properties.description: If transport is handled within the atmospheric chemistry scheme, describe it.

properties.label: Overview
properties.description: Overview atmospheric chemistry emissions

properties.label: Sources
properties.description: Sources of the chemical species emitted at the surface that are taken into account in the emissions scheme

enum.label: Surface Source Types
enum.description: Sources of the chemical species emitted at the surface that are taken into account in the emissions scheme

properties.label: Method
properties.description: Methods used to define chemical species emitted directly into model layers above the surface (several methods allowed because the different species may not use the same method).

enum.label: Emissions Methods
enum.description: Method used to define chemical species emitted (several methods allowed because the different species may not use the same method).

properties.label: Prescribed Climatology Emitted Species
properties.description: List of chemical species emitted at the surface and prescribed via a climatology, and the nature of the climatology (E.g. CO (monthly), C2H6 (constant))

properties.label: Prescribed Spatially Uniform Emitted Species
properties.description: List of chemical species emitted at the surface and prescribed as spatially uniform

properties.label: Interactive Emitted Species
properties.description: List of chemical species emitted at the surface and specified via an interactive method

properties.label: Other Emitted Species
properties.description: List of chemical species emitted at the surface and specified via any other method

properties.label: Sources
properties.description: Sources of chemical species emitted in the atmosphere that are taken into account in the emissions scheme.

enum.label: Atmospheric Source Types
enum.description: Sources of the chemical species emitted in the atmosphere that are taken into account in the emissions scheme

properties.label: Method
properties.description: Methods used to define the chemical species emitted in the atmosphere (several methods allowed because the different species may not use the same method).

enum.label: Emissions Methods
enum.description: Method used to define chemical species emitted (several methods allowed because the different species may not use the same method).

properties.label: Prescribed Climatology Emitted Species
properties.description: List of chemical species emitted in the atmosphere and prescribed via a climatology (E.g. CO (monthly), C2H6 (constant))

properties.label: Prescribed Spatially Uniform Emitted Species
properties.description: List of chemical species emitted in the atmosphere and prescribed as spatially uniform

properties.label: Interactive Emitted Species
properties.description: List of chemical species emitted in the atmosphere and specified via an interactive method

properties.label: Other Emitted Species
properties.description: List of chemical species emitted in the atmosphere and specified via an "other method"

properties.label: Prescribed Lower Boundary
properties.description: List of species prescribed at the lower boundary.

properties.label: Prescribed Upper Boundary
properties.description: List of species prescribed at the upper boundary.

properties.label: Overview
properties.description: Overview gas phase atmospheric chemistry

properties.label: Species
properties.description: Species included in the gas phase chemistry scheme.

enum.label: Species Types
enum.description: Species included in the gas phase chemistry scheme.

properties.label: Number Of Bimolecular Reactions
properties.description: The number of bi-molecular reactions in the gas phase chemistry scheme.

properties.label: Number Of Termolecular Reactions
properties.description: The number of ter-molecular reactions in the gas phase chemistry scheme.

properties.label: Number Of Tropospheric Heterogenous Reactions
properties.description: The number of reactions in the tropospheric heterogeneous chemistry scheme.

properties.label: Number Of Stratospheric Heterogenous Reactions
properties.description: The number of reactions in the stratospheric heterogeneous chemistry scheme.

properties.label: Number Of Advected Species
properties.description: The number of advected species in the gas phase chemistry scheme.

properties.label: Number Of Steady State Species
properties.description: The number of gas phase species for which the concentration is updated in the chemical solver assuming photochemical steady state

properties.label: Interactive Dry Deposition
properties.description: Is dry deposition interactive (as opposed to prescribed)? Dry deposition describes the dry processes by which gaseous species deposit themselves on solid surfaces thus decreasing their concentration in the air.

properties.label: Wet Deposition
properties.description: Is wet deposition included? Wet deposition describes the moist processes by which gaseous species deposit themselves on solid surfaces thus decreasing their concentration in the air.

properties.label: Wet Oxidation
properties.description: Is wet oxidation included? Oxidation describes the loss of electrons or an increase in oxidation state by a molecule

properties.label: Overview
properties.description: Overview stratospheric heterogenous atmospheric chemistry

properties.label: Gas Phase Species
properties.description: Gas phase species included in the stratospheric heterogeneous chemistry scheme.

enum.label: Gas Phase Species
enum.description: Gas phase species included in the stratospheric heterogeneous chemistry scheme

properties.label: Aerosol Species
properties.description: Aerosol species included in the stratospheric heterogeneous chemistry scheme.

enum.label: Aerosol Species
enum.description: Aerosol species included in the stratospheric heterogeneous chemistry scheme

properties.label: Number Of Steady State Species
properties.description: The number of steady state species in the stratospheric heterogeneous chemistry scheme.

properties.label: Sedimentation
properties.description: Is sedimentation is included in the stratospheric heterogeneous chemistry scheme or not?

properties.label: Coagulation
properties.description: Is coagulation is included in the stratospheric heterogeneous chemistry scheme or not?

properties.label: Overview
properties.description: Overview tropospheric heterogenous atmospheric chemistry

properties.label: Gas Phase Species
properties.description: List of gas phase species included in the tropospheric heterogeneous chemistry scheme.

properties.label: Aerosol Species
properties.description: Aerosol species included in the tropospheric heterogeneous chemistry scheme.

enum.label: Aerosol Species
enum.description: Aerosol species included in the stratospheric heterogeneous chemistry scheme

properties.label: Number Of Steady State Species
properties.description: The number of steady state species in the tropospheric heterogeneous chemistry scheme.

properties.label: Interactive Dry Deposition
properties.description: Is dry deposition interactive (as opposed to prescribed)? Dry deposition describes the dry processes by which gaseous species deposit themselves on solid surfaces thus decreasing their concentration in the air.

properties.label: Coagulation
properties.description: Is coagulation is included in the tropospheric heterogeneous chemistry scheme or not?

properties.label: Overview
properties.description: Overview atmospheric photo chemistry

properties.label: Number Of Reactions
properties.description: The number of reactions in the photo-chemistry scheme.

properties.label: Method
properties.description: Photolysis scheme

properties.label: Environmental Conditions
properties.description: Describe any environmental conditions taken into account by the photolysis scheme (e.g. whether pressure- and temperature-sensitive cross-sections and quantum yields in the photolysis calculations are modified to reflect the modelled conditions.)

properties.label: Overview
properties.description: Describe the general structure of the atmopsheric chemistry grid

properties.label: Matches Atmosphere Grid
properties.description: Does the atmospheric chemistry grid match the atmosphere grid?

subProcesses.label: Resolution
subProcesses.description: Resolution in the atmospheric chemistry grid

properties.label: Name
properties.description: This is a string usually used by the modelling group to describe the resolution of this grid, e.g. ORCA025, N512L180, T512L70 etc.

properties.label: Canonical Horizontal Resolution
properties.description: Expression quoted for gross comparisons of resolution, eg. 50km or 0.1 degrees etc.

properties.label: Number Of Horizontal Gridpoints
properties.description: Total number of horizontal (XY) points (or degrees of freedom) on computational grid.

properties.label: Number Of Vertical Levels
properties.description: Number of vertical levels resolved on computational grid.

properties.label: Is Adaptive Grid
properties.description: Default is False. Set true if grid resolution changes during execution.

keyProperties.label: Key Properties
keyProperties.description: Key properties of the atmospheric chemistry

properties.label: Model Overview
properties.description: Overview of atmospheric chemistry model.

properties.label: Model Name
properties.description: Name of atmospheric chemistry model code.

properties.label: Chemistry Scheme Scope
properties.description: Atmospheric domains covered by the atmospheric chemistry model

enum.label: Chemistry Scheme Scopes
enum.description: Atmospheric domains covered by the atmospheric chemistry model

properties.label: Basic Approximations
properties.description: Basic approximations made in the atmospheric chemistry model

properties.label: Prognostic Variables Form
properties.description: Form of prognostic variables in the atmospheric chemistry component.

enum.label: Prognostic Vars Types
enum.description: Form of prognostic variables in the atmospheric chemistry component.

properties.label: Number Of Tracers
properties.description: Number of advected tracers in the atmospheric chemistry model

properties.label: Family Approach
properties.description: Atmospheric chemistry calculations (not advection) generalized into families of species?

properties.label: Coupling With Chemical Reactivity
properties.description: Atmospheric chemistry transport scheme turbulence is couple with chemical reactivity?

properties.label: Repository
properties.description: Location of code for this component.

properties.label: Code Version
properties.description: Code version identifier.

properties.label: Code Languages
properties.description: Code language(s).

subProcesses.label: Timestep Framework
subProcesses.description: Timestepping in the atmospheric chemistry model

properties.label: Method
properties.description: Mathematical method deployed to solve the evolution of a given variable

enum.label: Timestepping Methods
enum.description: Mathematical method deployed to solve the evolution of a given variable

properties.label: Split Operator Advection Timestep
properties.description: Timestep for chemical species advection (in seconds)

properties.label: Split Operator Physical Timestep
properties.description: Timestep for physics (in seconds).

properties.label: Split Operator Chemistry Timestep
properties.description: Timestep for chemistry (in seconds).

properties.label: Integrated Timestep
properties.description: Timestep for the atmospheric chemistry model (in seconds)

properties.label: Integrated Scheme Type
properties.description: Specify the type of timestep scheme

enum.label: Integrated Scheme Types
enum.description: Specify the type of timestep scheme

properties.label: Turbulence
properties.description: Call order for turbulence scheme. This should be an integer greater than zero, and may be the same value as for another process if they are calculated at the same time.

properties.label: Convection
properties.description: Call order for convection scheme This should be an integer greater than zero, and may be the same value as for another process if they are calculated at the same time.

properties.label: Precipitation
properties.description: Call order for precipitation scheme. This should be an integer greater than zero, and may be the same value as for another process if they are calculated at the same time.

properties.label: Emissions
properties.description: Call order for emissions scheme. This should be an integer greater than zero, and may be the same value as for another process if they are calculated at the same time.

properties.label: Deposition
properties.description: Call order for deposition scheme. This should be an integer greater than zero, and may be the same value as for another process if they are calculated at the same time.

properties.label: Gas Phase Chemistry
properties.description: Call order for gas phase chemistry scheme. This should be an integer greater than zero, and may be the same value as for another process if they are calculated at the same time.

properties.label: Tropospheric Heterogeneous Phase Chemistry
properties.description: Call order for tropospheric heterogeneous phase chemistry scheme. This should be an integer greater than zero, and may be the same value as for another process if they are calculated at the same time.

properties.label: Stratospheric Heterogeneous Phase Chemistry
properties.description: Call order for stratospheric heterogeneous phase chemistry scheme. This should be an integer greater than zero, and may be the same value as for another process if they are calculated at the same time.

properties.label: Photo Chemistry
properties.description: Call order for photo chemistry scheme. This should be an integer greater than zero, and may be the same value as for another process if they are calculated at the same time.

properties.label: Aerosols
properties.description: Call order for aerosols scheme. This should be an integer greater than zero, and may be the same value as for another process if they are calculated at the same time.

subProcesses.label: Tuning Applied
subProcesses.description: Tuning methodology for atmospheric chemistry component

properties.label: Description
properties.description: General overview description of tuning: explain and motivate the main targets and metrics retained. &Document the relative weight given to climate performance metrics versus process oriented metrics, &and on the possible conflicts with parameterization level tuning. In particular describe any struggle &with a parameter value that required pushing it to its limits to solve a particular model deficiency.

properties.label: Global Mean Metrics Used
properties.description: List set of metrics of the global mean state used in tuning model/component

properties.label: Regional Metrics Used
properties.description: List of regional metrics of mean state used in tuning model/component

properties.label: Trend Metrics Used
properties.description: List observed trend metrics used in tuning model/component
